name: connecting_the_dots
description: This Project is born from real life situation: I was looking at a job ad regarding Websites content manager for a hotel chain, and I found myself in front of a conundrum about my less than orthodox career path - combining hotel sales managment, artistic endeavours and development. I made my considerations and concluded that there was no way that I would manage to make any recruiter believe in me if they saw a résumé with all that missmatched information.
